name: General's Ancient Helm
title: Ironclad Promise: General's Ancient Helm
desc: "The last drop of blood had soaked into the battlefield, and the glazed sands shone gloriously once more."
in_play_description: When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points.

skills.desc: When Action Phase begins: The character to which this is attached gains Unmovable Mountain that provides 2 Shield points. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
